# URLCache.StoragePolicy.notAllowed

**Case**

Storage in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCache] is not allowed in any fashion, either in memory or on disk.

## Declaration

```swift
case notAllowed
```

## Policies

- **URLCache.StoragePolicy.allowed**: Storage in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCache] is allowed without restriction.
- **URLCache.StoragePolicy.allowedInMemoryOnly**: Storage in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCache] is allowed; however storage should be restricted to memory only.
